mapper.insert: insert into rk (version_role, username, rolename, crypto_rolekey, crypto_rolesign, signature) values (#{versionRole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cryptoRolekey,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{cryptoRolesign,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update rk set version_role = #{versionRole,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rolename = #{rolename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, crypto_rolekey = #{cryptoRolekey,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, crypto_rolesign = #{cryptoRolesign,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, signature = #{signature,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, version_role, username, rolename, crypto_rolekey, crypto_rolesign, signature from rk
